text: @NYGovCuomo @Theresa90842128 Wow a tad bit late on that messaging, with 1/3 of all deaths attributed to Covid19 occurring in nursing facilities or long term health facilities! 🤔🇺🇸 @foxandfriends @MSNBC @CNN @WhiteHouse
